title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for SmartStoreAI, including components for scan-and-go shopping, self-checkout, IoT connectivity, computer vision for inventory management and customer behavior analysis. The design should also incorporate a modular structure to facilitate future updates, scalability, and flexibility. Additionally, consider edge computing for real-time data processing and ensure the system adheres to best practices for security, privacy, and compliance. This task will be broken down into smaller subtasks for efficient implementation.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store product information, customer data, and transaction records.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services for scan-and-go shopping, self-checkout, IoT connectivity, and computer vision.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interfaces for scan-and-go shopping, self-checkout, and customer-facing applications.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system complies with relevant security standards and regulations, and implement security measures.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure infrastructure, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides and technical documentation, and plan for user training.
